law.catch_line: In any report issued under this title, the Department may:...
law.text:
In any report issued under this title, the Department may:
Include recommendations for statutory and budgetary proposals to:
Promote public awareness of the benefits of conserving fisheries and wildlife in the State; and
Reduce the incidence of violations of State conservation laws; and
Submit the report to the Governor and, subject to § 2-1246 of the State Government Article, the General Assembly.
